title: HuanZhuGe
description: 环珠阁素食馆, at 东河区医院往东50米路北同十首歌旁, is a small veggie restaurant. Menu is in Chinese only. Buddhist atmosphere. Directions: when you are at the north gate of Renmin Park, turn right into Ximen Dajie, the place is after 50 to 100 meters on the opposite site of the road, nearly the last one in a row of small shops and restaurants.
streetAddress: Donghe District, Ximen Dajie, 50m east of north entrance of Renmin Park
